page.title: 18CHURCH VERGER
page.content:
At Old Windsor Parish church Mrs. Violet Baker has been the verger for 32 years and in 1985 attended her 434th wedding;she wears a special hat and gown for her work.Christenings and weddings are her favourite services; she finds that modern brides prefer the old-fashioned service. Her main job in the church is to put out hymn books for services,make sure the church is tidy and assist at services. This Summer(1985)she is travelling to visit a church built by Bill Cody in Wyoming,America. She thinks that 1985 will be remembered for the continuing changeability of English weather,wars around the world and space flights.
by Michelle
